overview: Three young men go to visit their cousins out in the Bavarian countryside. While they are approaching, one cousin is giving the other a friendly “Good Morning” blow job. The new arrivals change into the local wear and before they can get dressed, the horny cousins are checking out their equipment in their hungry mouths and asses. Colloquial costumes aren't worn very long as these horny guys have only sex on their minds. They go at it indoors and out, in the loft, the barn, the kitchen and in the fields. 6 long sex scenes. This video is a "Classic" and is widely bootlegged.
title: Verspielte Jungs
